name: Ext_R3_Task_context
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Task.context for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Task.context from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Healthcare event during which this task originated
element.definition: The healthcare event  (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this task was created.
element.comment: `Task.context` maps to R4 `Task.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo. `Task.context` maps to R4 `Task.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo.

element.short: Healthcare event during which this task originated
